[justify]Download Battle Towers 2.7 Mod APK (Unlimited Money) android modded game for your android mobile phone and tablet from Android Mobile Zone.

Battle Towers is a strategy game developed by GIGL, developer of famous game The Tribez Series. Two nations, order and chaos, are fighting for victory and world is suffering from battles against them. In history both lived side by side in harmony but now there is no option for peace. Each nation has its own units, buildings and spells.[/justify]

> 40 different battles, each with unique and detailed environments.
> You can set difficulty level according to your need.
> Great balanced game with offence and defence.
> Easy to understand controls to master this game.
> Optimised for smartphones as well as tablets.
> Enjoy the unlimited money in this mod version to build the perfect defence and offence mechanism.
